mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, CHG_PWD_QST, CHG_PWD_ANS, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, HEX(AES_ENCRyPT(#{userPwd}, 'youngjak')), #{chgPwdQst}, #{chgPwdAns}, NOW() )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEXTS ( TEXT_ID, IDX, TEXT1, TEXT_LANG, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{textId}, #{idx}, #{text1}, #{textLang}, #{userId}, NOW() )

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_TEXT ( USER_ID, TEXT_ID, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{textId}, #{useYn} )

SELECT TEXT_ID, IDX, INTERV, TEXT_KR, TEXT_EN, INSERT_USER_ID, SUM(INTERV)OVER(PARTITION BY TEXT_ID) AS SUM_INTERV FROM TEXTS T1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT TEXT_ID FROM (SELECT TEXT_ID FROM texts GROUP BY TEXT_ID ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1) T2 WHERE T1.TEXT_ID = T2.TEXT_ID) ORDER BY TEXT_ID, IDX
